## Category

Select the area this feature relates to:

- [ ] Simulation / Physics (Isaac, MuJoCo, Gazebo, PyBullet)
- [ ] Surgical Robotics (dVRK, ORBIT-Surgical, instruments)
- [ ] Agentic AI (LLM control, multi-agent coordination)
- [ ] Generative AI (VLA, diffusion policies, synthetic data)
- [ ] Digital Twins (patient modeling, treatment simulation)
- [ ] Unification (cross-framework tools, model conversion)
- [ ] Regulatory / Privacy (FDA, HIPAA, ICH-GCP)
- [ ] ML Pipeline (training, validation, deployment)

Describe the problem or missing capability in the current repo.

## Proposed Solution

Describe what you would like added or changed.

## Clinical Relevance

Explain how this benefits engineers building physical AI systems for oncology clinical trials.
